subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova hired Jimmy Connors, a former No. 1 player and an eight-time Grand Slam title winner, as her coach after splitting with Thomas Hogstedt on Friday.
snippet: Maria Sharapova hired Jimmy Connors, a former No. 1 player and an eight-time Grand Slam title winner, as her coach after splitting with Thomas Hogstedt on Friday.
